name: Snakes on a Rope
description:
Have you ever wanted to date a snake with fur? Well, now you can! Snakes on a Rope has everything you could want in a dating sim: action, romance, and multiple endings!

Romance a total of four different snakes. Each one has a unique personality and story. There are four endings, each with its own CG. Will you marry Queen Blue, or run away with Sir Orange? Perhaps you'll fall for Lady Pink or the royal guard. It's up to you in this revolutionary dating sim!
